PackageOracle.name: DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT_INSTANCE
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT_INSTANCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.059036000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equip_inst_avail_start_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_avail_end_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_prov_dt IN DATE
,total_port_cnectn_cnt IN NUMBER
,total_channel_cnt IN NUMBER
,network_strc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_fixed_asset_id IN NUMBER
,manufacturer_serial_num_val IN VARCHAR2
,ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equip_inst_avail_start_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_avail_end_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_prov_dt IN DATE
,total_port_cnectn_cnt IN NUMBER
,total_channel_cnt IN NUMBER
,network_strc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_fixed_asset_id IN NUMBER
,manufacturer_serial_num_val IN VARCHAR2
,ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_instance_id IN NUMBER
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equip_inst_avail_start_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_avail_end_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_prov_dt IN DATE
,total_port_cnectn_cnt IN NUMBER
,total_channel_cnt IN NUMBER
,network_strc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_fixed_asset_id IN NUMBER
,manufacturer_serial_num_val IN VARCHAR2
,ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_instance_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_network_equipment_instance;

body.name: DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT_INSTANCE
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_NETWORK_EQUIPMENT_INSTANCE
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.072925000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equip_inst_avail_start_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_avail_end_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_prov_dt IN DATE
,total_port_cnectn_cnt IN NUMBER
,total_channel_cnt IN NUMBER
,network_strc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_fixed_asset_id IN NUMBER
,manufacturer_serial_num_val IN VARCHAR2
,ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment_instance.add(fx), parms=' || network_equipment_product_id || '|' || equip_inst_avail_start_dt || '|' || equip_inst_avail_end_dt || '|' || equip_inst_prov_dt || '|' || total_port_cnectn_cnt || '|' || total_channel_cnt || '|' || network_strc_cd || '|' || equipment_fixed_asset_id || '|' || manufacturer_serial_num_val || '|' || ip_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_network_equipment_instance a
(
a.network_equipment_instance_id
,a.network_equipment_product_id
,a.equip_inst_avail_start_dt
,a.equip_inst_avail_end_dt
,a.equip_inst_prov_dt
,a.total_port_cnectn_cnt
,a.total_channel_cnt
,a.network_strc_cd
,a.equipment_fixed_asset_id
,a.manufacturer_serial_num_val
,a.ip_address_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_network_equipment_instance_i.NEXTVAL
,add.network_equipment_product_id
,add.equip_inst_avail_start_dt
,add.equip_inst_avail_end_dt
,add.equip_inst_prov_dt
,add.total_port_cnectn_cnt
,add.total_channel_cnt
,add.network_strc_cd
,add.equipment_fixed_asset_id
,add.manufacturer_serial_num_val
,add.ip_address_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.network_equipment_instance_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment_instance.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equip_inst_avail_start_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_avail_end_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_prov_dt IN DATE
,total_port_cnectn_cnt IN NUMBER
,total_channel_cnt IN NUMBER
,network_strc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_fixed_asset_id IN NUMBER
,manufacturer_serial_num_val IN VARCHAR2
,ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment_instance.add, parms=' || network_equipment_product_id || '|' || equip_inst_avail_start_dt || '|' || equip_inst_avail_end_dt || '|' || equip_inst_prov_dt || '|' || total_port_cnectn_cnt || '|' || total_channel_cnt || '|' || network_strc_cd || '|' || equipment_fixed_asset_id || '|' || manufacturer_serial_num_val || '|' || ip_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_network_equipment_instance a
(
a.network_equipment_instance_id
,a.network_equipment_product_id
,a.equip_inst_avail_start_dt
,a.equip_inst_avail_end_dt
,a.equip_inst_prov_dt
,a.total_port_cnectn_cnt
,a.total_channel_cnt
,a.network_strc_cd
,a.equipment_fixed_asset_id
,a.manufacturer_serial_num_val
,a.ip_address_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_network_equipment_instance_i.NEXTVAL
,add.network_equipment_product_id
,add.equip_inst_avail_start_dt
,add.equip_inst_avail_end_dt
,add.equip_inst_prov_dt
,add.total_port_cnectn_cnt
,add.total_channel_cnt
,add.network_strc_cd
,add.equipment_fixed_asset_id
,add.manufacturer_serial_num_val
,add.ip_address_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment_instance.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_instance_id IN NUMBER
,network_equipment_product_id IN NUMBER
,equip_inst_avail_start_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_avail_end_dt IN DATE
,equip_inst_prov_dt IN DATE
,total_port_cnectn_cnt IN NUMBER
,total_channel_cnt IN NUMBER
,network_strc_cd IN VARCHAR2
,equipment_fixed_asset_id IN NUMBER
,manufacturer_serial_num_val IN VARCHAR2
,ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment_instance.add, parms=' || network_equipment_instance_id || '|' || network_equipment_product_id || '|' || equip_inst_avail_start_dt || '|' || equip_inst_avail_end_dt || '|' || equip_inst_prov_dt || '|' || total_port_cnectn_cnt || '|' || total_channel_cnt || '|' || network_strc_cd || '|' || equipment_fixed_asset_id || '|' || manufacturer_serial_num_val || '|' || ip_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_network_equipment_instance a
(
a.network_equipment_instance_id
,a.network_equipment_product_id
,a.equip_inst_avail_start_dt
,a.equip_inst_avail_end_dt
,a.equip_inst_prov_dt
,a.total_port_cnectn_cnt
,a.total_channel_cnt
,a.network_strc_cd
,a.equipment_fixed_asset_id
,a.manufacturer_serial_num_val
,a.ip_address_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.network_equipment_instance_id
,add.network_equipment_product_id
,add.equip_inst_avail_start_dt
,add.equip_inst_avail_end_dt
,add.equip_inst_prov_dt
,add.total_port_cnectn_cnt
,add.total_channel_cnt
,add.network_strc_cd
,add.equipment_fixed_asset_id
,add.manufacturer_serial_num_val
,add.ip_address_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment_instance.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,network_equipment_instance_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_network_equipment_instance.del, parms=' || network_equipment_instance_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_network_equipment_instance a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.network_equipment_instance_id = del.network_equipment_instance_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_network_equipment_instance.del');

END del;

END da_network_equipment_instance;
